channel.title: Privacy on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Arrans github.io

item.title: awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted
item.description: A list of Free Software network services and web applications which can be hosted on your own servers

item.title: Picocrypt/Picocrypt
item.description: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.

item.title: ente-io/ente
item.description: 🔒 End-to-end encrypted cloud for photos, videos and 2FA secrets.

item.title: Rezivure/Grid-Mobile
item.description: Grid: Private Location Sharing mobile app for iOS/Android. E2EE with Matrix.

item.title: Volmarg/personal-management-system
item.description: Your web application for managing personal data. personal.management.system.inbox@gmail.com

item.title: anyproto/anytype-ts
item.description: Official Anytype client for MacOS, Linux, and Windows

item.title: ungoogled-software/ungoogled-chromium
item.description: Google Chromium, sans integration with Google

item.title: rudderlabs/rudder-server
item.description: Privacy and Security focused Segment-alternative, in Golang and React

item.title: simplex-chat/simplex-chat
item.description: SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS, Android and desktop apps 📱!

item.title: alphacep/vosk-api
item.description: Offline speech recognition API for Android, iOS, Raspberry Pi and servers with Python, Java, C# and Node

item.title: keepassxreboot/keepassxc
item.description: KeePassXC is a cross-platform community-driven port of the Windows application “Keepass Password Safe”.

item.title: M66B/FairEmail
item.description: Fully featured, open source, privacy friendly email app for Android

item.title: gotify/server
item.description: A simple server for sending and receiving messages in real-time per WebSocket. (Includes a sleek web-ui)

item.title: anyproto/any-sync
item.description: An open-source protocol enabling high-performance, local-first, peer-to-peer, end-to-end encrypted collaborative apps.

item.title: anyproto/anytype-heart
item.description: Shared library for Anytype clients

item.title: TeamPiped/Piped
item.description: An alternative privacy-friendly YouTube frontend which is efficient by design.

item.title: forwardemail/forwardemail.net
item.description: Privacy-focused encrypted email for everyone. All-in-one alternative to Gmail + Mailchimp + Sendgrid.

item.title: Sync-in/server
item.description: Sync-in Server – Platform for secure file storage, synchronization, and collaboration.

item.title: keshav-space/safenotes
item.description: Safe Notes is a security project aimed at providing an encrypted, private note manager that works locally and protects notes from various threat actors.

item.title: RayJW/awesome-foss
item.description: A collection of all the FOSS software I regularly use or follow to keep track of privacy respecting alternatives. This is a mirror of a Codeberg repository.
